sentence.Network_en: He was disfranchised of the right to vote.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 一旦一个人或一个族群觉得自己被排斥、被剥夺（disfranchised），就会与对方对立，寻求报复。而如此「被剥夺」的感觉， 若再有 …

means.word_mean: 1. deprived of the rights of citizenship especially the right to vote
